channel.title: How to add pkp item prices?
channel.description: I am useing MTP V2 (A sourced [PI] server). I want to know how to add pkp prices in a pkp shop. Example... I add an armadyl godsword to my pkp shop, I log in game after compiling, I go to pkp shop, and the armadyl godsword is 0 pkp. I need to know how to make it a different amount please.

item.title: How to add pkp item prices?
item.dc:creator: @Arcane_Mage Arcane Mage
item.description:
@Arcane_Mage wrote:

[quote=“Anc13nts253, post:2, topic:374114”]If your adding pk points and you want the item to be a certain amount of pk points you can’t have the item in any other shop.
I’m pretty sure you can edit the item price in the

“Prices.txt” Located in Data/cfg.

Search the item ID say a whip for example 4151, change the number next to it (Which will be the price) to w\e pk points you want. Let’s say 100. It will be purchased for 100 pk points in the shop, but if you add it to any other shop it will be able to be purchased for 100 coins.

If that doesn’t work you can do it in your Item.cfg aswell.[/quote]

thats what i tried at first also, but it didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: How to add pkp item prices?

item.title: How to add pkp item prices?
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

shopassistant.java

Src/model/shops/shopassistant.

Find an existing code, E.g 11694 - Copy and paste that, with the return

example.
case 11694 - Ags
return:150 - 150 pkp.

item.title: How to add pkp item prices?
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

If your adding pk points and you want the item to be a certain amount of pk points you can’t have the item in any other shop.
I’m pretty sure you can edit the item price in the

“Prices.txt” Located in Data/cfg.

Search the item ID say a whip for example 4151, change the number next to it (Which will be the price) to w\e pk points you want. Let’s say 100. It will be purchased for 100 pk points in the shop, but if you add it to any other shop it will be able to be purchased for 100 coins.

If that doesn’t work you can do it in your Item.cfg aswell.

Read full topic
